title: Panic At The Disco - Pretty Odd [2008][CD+Music Vid+Covers]
description:
PANIC AT THE DISCO - PRETTY ODD, album released in the UK March 25th 2008.
Encoded 192Kbps [Lame] mp3.  CD Covers & Music Video included

Panic at the Disco [often shortened to merely PATD] is a band that originated in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA. They got the name from the lyrics of a song called &#039;Panic&#039;, by Name Taken. Their sound incorporates elements of pop, electronica, dance, and rock, along with many other genres. Their 2005 debut album, &#039;A Fever You Can&#039;t Sweat Out&#039;, reached No.13 on the US Billboard 200, and has sold over 2.2 million copies since its September 2005 release.

&#039;Pretty Odd&#039;. is the second studio album by rock band Panic at the Disco, to be released in the United Kingdom and New Zealand on March 24th 2008, in the United States on March 25th and in Australia on March 29th on the record label Fueled by Ramen. A more melodic outlook was evident when the Vegas emo-rockers toured last summer, and this album confirms their growth, venturing into folk, funk and fiddle-powered country. Their vaudevillian streak remains, but &#039;Nine In The Afternoon&#039; is a Beatles-esque tour-de-force and &#039;She&#039;s A Handsome Woman&#039; a punk-pop gem. The album&#039;s first single, &#039;Nine In The Afternoon&#039;, was released on January 29th 2008, and at the time of writing [March 22nd 2008] is at No.13 in the UK Singles chart.
